title: How many books are free in kindle store? - Quora

response.answer_text: Buying an Amazon Kindle is a one-time investment whose benefits you can reap for years to come. There are more than 3 million free books currently available on Kindle. The list keeps getting updated and increased as more authors publish their books. I have a kindle myself but still feel that it cannot replace a physical book. It becomes really inconvenient to read on the device at times. The lighting is also harmful for the eyes and when I zoom too much, the pixels start breaking and the text blurs. I have also felt that most of the books that kindle offers for free are classics which I have already read. New books that come in the market are almost never available for free on Kindle. There is a website by the name of MyPustak that I find quite economical. They sell all books completely free of cost and all you are required to pay for is the shipping fee.

There're thousands of books available for free. There is no hard 'number' that I can think of. Here is a link where you can browse some free classics. Amazon.com: Free Popular Classics: Kindle Store  Also, you can sign up for sites which send you deals regarding books. Some authors/publishing houses give away a book for free or a large discount 'some'times. Like when a new book is released or during some special times like Christmas/New year and so on. Bookbub Great deals on bestsellers you'll love  is a great site in this regard.
